snippet: Perhaps three million people and 3,000 police officers were at the annual Macy’s spectacular in Manhattan amid stepped-up security measures....
abstract: New York City increases security measures, including truck barricades, for annual Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade in effort to protect estimated 3 million people attending event; decision to add side-street blockades came after July 2016 attack in Nice, France.
lead_paragraph: Perhaps three million people and 3,000 police officers were at the annual Macy’s spectacular in Manhattan amid stepped-up security measures.

headline.main: A Joyful Thanksgiving Parade, Beyond the Barricades
headline.print_headline: Truck Barriers at the Corners, but a Joyful Parade
